messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, so have I, which is why I felt like I had been punched in the stomach when I read that line about her class.  She s right, it IS offensive when used
messages.messageBody:
Ren said:

> I've appreciated your posts a lot lately Joylyn..

Yes, so have I, which is why I felt like I had been punched in the stomach
when I read that line about her class. She's right, it IS offensive when used
in a hurtful, dismissive manner.
Mary J
